import { useState } from "react"; import Styles from "../components/styles"; import lang from "../components/language"; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-grid-system'; export default () => { const [currLang, setCurrLang] = useState("hebrew"); const [currCountry, setCurrCountry] = useState("Israel"); const [formState, setFormState] = useState(0); return
{lang[currLang].header.OurMission} {lang[currLang].header.Terms}

{lang[currLang].title}

{formState === 0 &&

{lang[currLang].subtitle}: {lang[currLang].countries[currCountry]}

} {formState === 1 &&

בחר את הבנק שלך

}
